fixes.name: Gross Utilization % (Corp)
fixes.dax_expression: ABS( SUM('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)]) / MAX('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Limit (Corp)]) )
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated Tableau ABS(SUM([Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)])/MAX([Limit (Corp)])) to DAX. SUM and MAX are preserved as aggregations and wrapped with ABS. All column references were converted to the 'TableName'[Column] format and kept on the same table. This calculation requires a measure because it uses aggregation functions.
